mapper.select: select b.*, m.name from board b left join member m on m.midx = b.midx where b.deleteyn = 'N' order by b.writedate desc
select b.*, m.name, f.originalname, f.path from board b left join member m on m.midx = b.midx left join file f on f.fidx = b.fidx where b.bidx = #{bidx}
mapper.insert: insert into board (category, title, content, pwd, midx, fidx) values (#{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{pwd}, #{midx}, #{fidx})
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where deleteyn = 'N'
mapper.update: update board set readcount = readcount + 1, reader = #{reader} where bidx = #{bidx} and (find_in_set(#{midx},reader) = 0 or find_in_set(#{midx},reader) is null)
mapper.select: select * from board where bidx = #{bidx} and pwd = #{pwd}
